Complaints Procedure

Golden Pathway ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to providing a high standard of information and service. If you are dissatisfied with any aspect of our website or the information provided, you have the right to make a complaint. This procedure outlines how you can make a complaint and how we will handle it, in accordance with UK law.

How to Make a Complaint

If you wish to make a complaint, please contact us by email at info@goldenpathway.co.uk with the following details:

  • Your name and contact details
  • A clear description of your complaint
  • Any relevant supporting information or evidence

What Happens Next

We will acknowledge receipt of your complaint within 5 working days. We aim to investigate and respond to all complaints within 20 working days. If we need more time, we will let you know and provide an estimated timescale.

Our Commitment

We will treat your complaint seriously, fairly, and confidentially. We will investigate the issues raised and take appropriate action where necessary. We will keep you informed throughout the process and provide a clear explanation of our findings and any actions taken.

If You Are Not Satisfied

If you are not satisfied with our response, you may request a review of your complaint. We will conduct a further review and provide a final response. If you remain dissatisfied, you may seek independent advice or contact the relevant regulatory body in the UK.

Contact Us

For all complaints and related correspondence, please contact us at info@goldenpathway.co.uk.
